 Upgrading your MongoDB installation 
When a new edition of MongoDB is released on IBM® Passport Advantage®, you
can upgrade the software installation on IBM Cloud Pak for Data. 
 Before you begin 
 
Before you upgrade an existing installation of the MongoDB database add-on, you
should run a full backup of the database. For more information on running a full
backup of your database, see Preparing to back up or restore MongoDB databases. 
About this task 
 
You need to have the authority to download the PPA package to your cluster. Also,
your account must have authority to run kubectl exec and helm commands on the
master node of your Cloud Pak for Data cluster.

document_passages.passage_text: To integrate the applications, complete the following tasks: Preparing your IBM Guardium system If you plan to use IBM Guardium to audit assets from IBM Cloud Pak for Data, you must prepare your IBM Guardium system so that the applications can communicate. Connecting to IBM Guardium appliances You must create a connection to each IBM Guardium appliance that you will use to audit assets.

Preparing your IBM Guardium system If you plan to use IBM® Guardium® to audit assets from IBM Cloud Pak for Data, you must prepare your IBM Guardium system so that the applications can communicate. About this task To ensure that assets from Cloud Pak for Data can be audited, an IBM Guardium administrator must complete the following steps. Procedure Create a user in IBM Guardium
